item.title: PEDO Act: Lawmaker moves to protect Epstein files, accuses 'certain FBI agents' of trying to destroy docs
item.description: Rep. Andy Ogles is preparing legislation to safeguard the FBI's Jeffrey Epstein files and other documentation.

item.title: 11 House Dems vote with Republicans to overturn Biden's gas water heater ban
item.description: The House passed a resolution on Thursday to overturn a Biden-era ban on non-condensing, natural-gas-fired water heaters by 2029.

item.title: US and Canada conduct air defense drills in Greenland as Trump pushes for control
item.description: U.S. and Canadian servicemembers are running air defense exercises in Greenland this week as they train for bitter cold conditions.

item.title: Trump urged to use executive power after Vance relative reportedly denied organ transplant over COVID vaccine
item.description: House Republicans are urging President Trump to use executive action on COVID-19 mandates for organ transplants.

item.title: Straight woman's job discrimination claim likely to prevail with SCOTUS rebuke of lower court: expert
item.description: The Supreme Court appears poised to issue a ruling in favor of a straight woman's discrimination case, reversing a lower court's decision that require...
